com.gemalto.idp.mobile.fasttrack.protector

Class BiometricAuthenticationStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.fasttrack.protector.BiometricAuthenticationStatus

  • public class BiometricAuthenticationStatus
extends Object
    Status of biometric authentication.
    Since:
    5.4.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BIO_AUTHENTICATION_BLOCKED
      Maximum number of authentication attempts has reached.
      static int BIO_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
      Authentication failed.
      static int BIO_AUTHENTICATION_SUCCESS
      Authentication is successful.
      static int BIOMETRIC_CANCELED
      The user canceled the operation.
      static int BIOMETRIC_HW_UNAVAILABLE
      Biometric hardware is unavailable on the device.
      static int BIOMETRIC_KEY_INVALIDATED
      An internal key has been invalidated by the system.
      static int BIOMETRIC_NO_HARDWARE
      No biometric hardware on the device.
      static int BIOMETRIC_NOT_ACTIVATED
      Biometric mode has not been activated for the tokenDevice.
      static int BIOMETRIC_NOT_ENROLLED
      Biometric is not enrolled on the device.
      static int BIOMETRIC_SDK_INTERNAL_ERROR
      Internal operation failed.

    • Field Detail

      • BIO_AUTHENTICATION_SUCCESS

        public static final int BIO_AUTHENTICATION_SUCCESS
        Authentication is successful. The application integrator can now dismiss any dialog prompt.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIOMETRIC_NO_HARDWARE

        public static final int BIOMETRIC_NO_HARDWARE
        No biometric hardware on the device.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIOMETRIC_HW_UNAVAILABLE

        public static final int BIOMETRIC_HW_UNAVAILABLE
        Biometric hardware is unavailable on the device.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIOMETRIC_NOT_ENROLLED

        public static final int BIOMETRIC_NOT_ENROLLED
        Biometric is not enrolled on the device. If biometric is supported, the application prompts the user to enroll the biometric from device'Settings.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIOMETRIC_SDK_INTERNAL_ERROR

        public static final int BIOMETRIC_SDK_INTERNAL_ERROR
        Internal operation failed. Check the message for more details.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIO_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED

        public static final int BIO_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
        Authentication failed. The application integrator can prompt user to try again.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIO_AUTHENTICATION_BLOCKED

        public static final int BIO_AUTHENTICATION_BLOCKED
        Maximum number of authentication attempts has reached. The sensor is blocked by the system. The user has to wait for approximately 30 seconds. On some devices, user is required to enter the pass code through the lock screen to unlock the sensor.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIOMETRIC_CANCELED

        public static final int BIOMETRIC_CANCELED
        The user canceled the operation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIOMETRIC_KEY_INVALIDATED

        public static final int BIOMETRIC_KEY_INVALIDATED
        An internal key has been invalidated by the system.
        • User has enrolled new biometric after the activation of Biometric mode.
        • User has changed the lock screen configuration.

        Application integrator should deactivate and reactivate the Biometric mode.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIOMETRIC_NOT_ACTIVATED

        public static final int BIOMETRIC_NOT_ACTIVATED
        Biometric mode has not been activated for the tokenDevice. Please refer to TokenDevice.activateBioFingerprintMode(String).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
